Text:
Thank you so much for uploading this. I saw that you've posted an older torrent with lower quality, and that you would upload it in FLAC. How is that going? I've actually got the vinyl myself, but I don't have equipment, just as you.

Please, DO upload it in FLAC someday! I'll be waiting!
Thank you SamanthaSweet for this torrent! Yesterday I saw first time in my life the film and I am expecting the soundtrack will be as brilliant as the movie itself. :)
Hey, SamanthaSweet, can you seed this and I will be very grateful and will promise to seed to a ratio of 20! Thanks! Peace, Phantazm79
